Service Details: - Sells used items and contributes a percentage of gross revenue to the Kelowna Branch of the SPCA - Accepts donations of housewares, china and cutlery, furniture, rugs, curtains, appliances, electronic equipment, clothing, games, and books - Please call to inquire about pick-up of larger items
Major Intersection: Dougall Rd N and Froelich Rd
